mapper.select: SELECT F.RN, F.FREE_BOARD_NO, F.ID, F.FREE_TITLE, F.FREE_CONTENT, F.IP, F.CREATE_DATE, F.STATE, F.DEPTH, F.GROUP_NO, F.GROUP_ORDER FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, GROUP_ORDER ASC) AS RN, FREE_BOARD_NO, ID, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT, IP, CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORDER FROM FREE_BOARD) F WHERE F.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD (FREE_BOARD_NO, ID, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT, IP, CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORDER) VALUES (FREE_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{freeTitle}, #{freeContent}, #{ip}, SYSDATE, 1, 0, FREE_BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0)
